description: Hi! I'm a passionate programmer with a background in commercial advisory in the banking sector. Driven by my passion for technology, I have dedicated myself to mastering React and Angular, excelling in creating efficient and intuitive web solutions. My skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript allow me to design attractive and functional interfaces, while my fluency in English facilitates collaboration on international projects. I am committed to continuous learning and excited to take on new challenges that help me grow as a developer.
